729101f-a.title: Richmond: Main Street - Craig Avenue
729101f-a.text:
Main Street,south of the S.E. corner of Craig Avenue, showing the
South Baptist Church.
September 6, 1935
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729101f-a.folder: Main Street & Craig Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729097f-a.title: Richmond: Main Street - Craig Avenue
729097f-a.text:
205 Main Street, east side, between Craig Avenue and Amboy
Road. This house belonged to Winant in 1874 (Beers's map), and
later (1898-1907) to I.P. Bedell.
September 6, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
729097f-a.folder: Main Street & Craig Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729096f-a.title: Richmond: Main Street - Craig Avenue
729096f-a.text:
190 Main Street, at the S.W. corner of Craig Avenue, showing the
Richmond County Federal Savings and Loan Association building.
November 26, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
